channel.title: What should I do?
channel.description:
I can't stop thinking about this girl... Her name is Emily.
I can't explain why I like her so much, she's just awesome.
This feeling I have right now, it's the first time I've ever had this feeling about a girl.
It's not a 'horney' feeling. It kinda feels like I'm somewhat sick, but I'm not.
She does have a boyfriend at the moment. But I believe the only reason she hasn't broken up with him yet is because she doesn't want to hurt him (she's nice that way :P).
She's going to be moving soon, meaning she won't be going to this church anymore (I'm homeschooled, the only place I see her is at church).
I just... Don't know what to do.
I'm very shy, I hate talking to anyone unless I've spent a lot of time with them that day.
Please write,
Mike.

item.title: What should I do?
item.dc:creator: @jason2gs jason2gs

Thanks, Sean.

One of the most helpful replies in this thread

item.title: What should I do?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Sean, post:30, topic:57501”]haha. hahahahahaha.

Oh how the replies amuse me so.

[quote]what are you talking about??“if she wanted to be with you- she wouldnt be with him”
Of course not, you have to talk to her, prove her you’re much better then her boyfriend. It’s not all about looks, it’s about your personality . Trust me, if you’re not one of the good looking guys, you can make that girl fall in love with you.

man, i really would like to help you. I know how it feels…[/quote]

  1. ever heard of the friend zone
  2. that is a pathetic and low down attempt at trying to steal a guys gf
  3. if she was unhappy with the relationship, or looking for another guy - why is she in that relationship

Looking from the outside in on a relationship is one thing, this guy dosent seem to know her at fucking all. I wouldnt be suprised if hes said more to plants than her. I am not having a go at him, I am meerly stating the facts. By all means, be her friend, but do not spend every moment of your day holding out hope. It could happen, sure, that would be great - but you are talking like you are in love with a girl you dont fully know.

And as for trying to steal her - ‘real’ relationships are strong and arent broken by one guy with a hardon for the girl. If anything you are potentially going to make her feel akward around you, and that isnt what you want to do. Maybe your experiance of “Pmg date me plz I r teh cooler dan j00r boyfriend” has been succesful, but think outside of the playground maybe?[/quote]

wow great advice even tho im not in that situation

Pmg date me plz I r teh cooler dan j00r boyfriend
so thats where ive been going wrong

Read full topic

item.title: What should I do?
item.dc:creator: @Sean Sean
item.description:
@Sean wrote:

haha. hahahahahaha.

Oh how the replies amuse me so.

what are you talking about??"if she wanted to be with you- she wouldnt be with him" Of course not, you have to talk to her, prove her you're much better then her boyfriend. It's not all about looks, it's about your personality . Trust me, if you're not one of the good looking guys, you can make that girl fall in love with you.

man, i really would like to help you. I know how it feels…

  1. ever heard of the friend zone
  2. that is a pathetic and low down attempt at trying to steal a guys gf
  3. if she was unhappy with the relationship, or looking for another guy - why is she in that relationship

Looking from the outside in on a relationship is one thing, this guy dosent seem to know her at fucking all. I wouldnt be suprised if hes said more to plants than her. I am not having a go at him, I am meerly stating the facts. By all means, be her friend, but do not spend every moment of your day holding out hope. It could happen, sure, that would be great - but you are talking like you are in love with a girl you dont fully know.

And as for trying to steal her - ‘real’ relationships are strong and arent broken by one guy with a hardon for the girl. If anything you are potentially going to make her feel akward around you, and that isnt what you want to do. Maybe your experiance of “Pmg date me plz I r teh cooler dan j00r boyfriend” has been succesful, but think outside of the playground maybe?

Read full topic

item.title: What should I do?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“The Cursed, post:15, topic:57501”][quote author=Sean link=topic=81906.msg892079#msg892079 date=1171319602]

I can’t stop thinking about this girl… Her name is Emily.

I can’t explain why I like her so much, she’s just awesome.

This feeling I have right now, it’s the first time I’ve ever had this feeling about a girl.

It’s not a ‘horney’ feeling. It kinda feels like I’m somewhat sick, but I’m not.

She does have a boyfriend at the moment. But I believe the only reason she hasn’t broken up with him yet is because she doesn’t want to hurt him (she’s nice that way :P).

She’s going to be moving soon, meaning she won’t be going to this church anymore (I’m homeschooled, the only place I see her is at church).

I just… Don’t know what to do.

I’m very shy, I hate talking to anyone unless I’ve spent a lot of time with them that day.

Please write,

Mike.

dont do a thing, move on - she has a boyfriend - if she wanted to be with you - she wouldnt be with him. If and when she dumps him, then ask her out. Dont plot, dont scheme, dont try to break them up.
[/quote]
what are you talking about??“if she wanted to be with you- she wouldnt be with him”
Of course not, you have to talk to her, prove her you’re much better then her boyfriend. It’s not all about looks, it’s about your personality . Trust me, if you’re not one of the good looking guys, you can make that girl fall in love with you.

man, i really would like to help you. I know how it feels…[/quote]

At his age of course looks matter. I’m not pointing any fingers, but if you’re a sweaty greasy nerdy kid, no chick is going to go out with you unless she is also the same(even then, that’s just gross). You don’t have to be a football star to win a girl, but you certainly cannot be a creepy ugly kid.

As for darting right in and asking her out, I think that’s a horrible idea(just my oppinion). For one thing, her boyfriend will kick your ass and really the best way to get a girl to like you is just talk to her a lot and become friends, with more flirting involved. I’m definitly no guru about girls, but I have had 2 girlfriends so I do have a little bit experience.

Read full topic

cut your penis off.
Lol, joke.
Just get to know her more… the time will come when you will be together, and if that day doesnt come then dont fret… plenty more fish in the sea, and dont say she is the only one, because theyre are about 3-4billion girls in this world.

item.title: What should I do?
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

[quote=“Gotta Catch Them All, post:16, topic:57501”][quote author=The Cursed link=topic=81906.msg892313#msg892313 date=1171323417]

I can’t stop thinking about this girl… Her name is Emily.

I can’t explain why I like her so much, she’s just awesome.

This feeling I have right now, it’s the first time I’ve ever had this feeling about a girl.

It’s not a ‘horney’ feeling. It kinda feels like I’m somewhat sick, but I’m not.

She does have a boyfriend at the moment. But I believe the only reason she hasn’t broken up with him yet is because she doesn’t want to hurt him (she’s nice that way :P).

She’s going to be moving soon, meaning she won’t be going to this church anymore (I’m homeschooled, the only place I see her is at church).

I just… Don’t know what to do.

I’m very shy, I hate talking to anyone unless I’ve spent a lot of time with them that day.

Please write,

Mike.

dont do a thing, move on - she has a boyfriend - if she wanted to be with you - she wouldnt be with him. If and when she dumps him, then ask her out. Dont plot, dont scheme, dont try to break them up.

what are you talking about??“if she wanted to be with you- she wouldnt be with him”
Of course not, you have to talk to her, prove her you’re much better then her boyfriend. It’s not all about looks, it’s about your personality . Trust me, if you’re not one of the good looking guys, you can make that girl fall in love with you.
[/quote]

I think what he was trying to say was not to try and break her and her boyfriend up just because he likes her.[/quote]

Shit, I’m not gana lie, if I liked a girl and she had a boyfriend I’d try my damnedest to break them up. By that I mean I’d plot and scheme (aka can get her off the rebound?)

Read full topic
